message:

### The error may involve defaultParameterMap
### The error occurred while setting parameters
### SQL: insert into event         (name,location,startTime,endTime,type,size,remark,organizer)         values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
### Cause: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'startTime' in 'field list'
; bad SQL grammar []; nested exception is com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'startTime' in 'field list'
